attributes.action: Stop Halton Borough Council from scrapping free school meals service.
attributes.additional_details: School children are some of our most vulnerable people in society and children should not go without food due to the councils mis management of its finances.
attributes.background: I would like the government to force Halton Borough Council to do a U Turn on scrapping free school meal services. Potentially give Halton Borough Council increased funding solely for free school meals.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about free school meals, above and beyond national arrangements for free school meals, are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
